DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor predict patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This laboratory study examine biological marker patient follicular lymphoma treat clinical trial SWOG-8809 , SWOG-9800 , SWOG-9911 .
DOC.brief_title: S8809-S9800-S9911TM- Biological Markers Patients With Follicular Lymphoma Treated Clinical Trial SWOG-8809 , SWOG-9800 , SWOG-9911
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine prognostic significance MUM-1 , lymphoma-associated macrophage , regulatory T cell patient follicular lymphoma treat clinical trial SWOG-8809 , SWOG-9800 , SWOG-9911 represent pre- post-monoclonal antibody therapy protocol . - Determine whether factor similar prognostic significance patient treat chemotherapy alone vs chemotherapy monoclonal antibody therapy clinical trial . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Previously collect tissue sample patient analyzed immunohistochemistry , gene expression profiling , quantitative analysis MUM1 expression , lymphoma-associated macrophage , FOXP3-positive regulatory T cell , CD68 , CD163 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 318 sample accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis follicular lymphoma Previously treat follow clinical trial : SWOG8809 SWOG9800 SWOG9911 PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
